Title: Mesrine: Public Enemy No. 1
Writer: Abdel Raouf Dafri (scenario), Abdel Raouf Dafri (adaptation), Jean-François Richet (adaptation)
Actors: Vincent Cassel, Ludivine Sagnier, Mathieu Amalric, Samuel Le Bihan
Plot: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life and death as France's Public Enemy No. 1 in the 1970s.
Production: 120 Films, Région Haute-Normandie, Remstar Productions, Uni Etoile 4, Cinémage 2, Centre National de la Cinematographie, M6 Films, Natixis Coficiné, Uni Étoile 5, La Petite Reine, Canal+, Pathé, Banque Populaire Images 8, TPS Star
